issues.description: The method singFarmSongVerse in the template repository is declared without parameters, while the problem statement and solution repository expect it to have a parameter of type Animal. This discrepancy could confuse students who base their implementation on the template code, leading them to implement a method that doesn't match the intended design, potentially causing errors when trying to call it with an Animal argument as described.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the template repository's Farm.java file to declare the singFarmSongVerse method with the correct parameter, e.g., 'private void singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)', to align with the problem statement and solution, ensuring students have a consistent starting point without needing to infer missing structural elements.
